opis: POSLOVNO - STAMBENI KOMPLEKS u nacionalnom parku, rijetka je prilika na tržištu, a još ako je riječ u uspješnom poslovanju, sa sigurnim prihodima, idealna j e investicija za mlade poduzetne ljude, željne rada i poslovnih uspjeha. Ovdje se radi o četiri samostojeće kuće sagrađene u skladu sa zakonodavnim propisima gradnje u Nacionalnim parkovima, dakle samo prirodni materijali, površine i krovovi unaprijed je zakonski određeno. Šumski krajolik uokolo pruža mogućnost odmora i za avanturiste i za obitelji rekreativce kao i one koji bi trajno živjeli u skladu s prirodom a pritom i uprihodili dohodak. 1.kuća = 2 spavaće sobe sa 2 kupaonice, dnevni boravak sa kaminom, te kuhinju i kupaonicu. 2. kuća = 2 spavaće sobe sa 2 kupaonice, terasu, dnevni boravak sa kaminom, kuhinjom i kupaonicom. 3. kuća = 8 spavaćih soba, sa kupaonicama. 4.kuća = 8 spavaćih soba sa kupaonicama, konobu sa kuhinjom te restoran sa kaminom. U kućama ima ukupno 23 kupaonice i 1 wc. Budući da je svaki od objekata zemljišno knjižno zasebna cjelina, budući vlasnik može prenamijeniti velike kuće u stambeni objekt ili registrirati sobe na pravnu osobu obrt ili d.o.o, te se na taj način mogu pružati usluge i večere za svoje goste. Objekti se nalaze usred zelenila na 4 km od Korenice, u tradicionalno izgrađenim kućama s drvenim elementima. Objekti nude sobe s besplatnim bežičnim pristupom internetu i LCD TV-om sa satelitskim programima. Nekretnine se nalaze se usred zelenila u blizini Korenice, u tradicionalno izgrađene s drvenim elementima. Svi objekti imaju bežični pristup internetu i LCD TV-om sa satelitskim programima. Svi nužni životno potrebni sadržaji nalaze se u obližnjoj Korenici, kao i škole i sportsko rekreativni sadržaji. Zato je ovo IDEALNA INVESTICIJA?? Po mnogo čemu je idealna, a prije svega po činjenici da kupac može odmah krenuti sa vraćanjem uloženog i uživati u mirnom okruženju prepunom sadržaja koji su svima danas prijeko potrebni. ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- BUSINESS - RESIDENTIAL COMPLEX in the national park, is a rare opportunity on the market, and even more so if it is a successful business, with secure income, it is an ideal investment for young enterprising people, eager for work and business success. These are four detached houses built in accordance with the legislative regulations for construction in National Parks, so only natural materials, surfaces and roofs are legally determined in advance. The surrounding forest landscape offers a vacation opportunity for both adventurers and recreational families, as well as those who would like to live permanently in harmony with nature and at the same time earn an income. 1st house = 2 bedrooms with 2 bathrooms, living room with fireplace, and kitchen and bathroom. 2nd house = 2 bedrooms with 2 bathrooms, terrace, living room with fireplace, kitchen and bathroom. 3rd house = 8 bedrooms, with bathrooms. 4th house = 8 bedrooms with bathrooms, tavern with kitchen and restaurant with fireplace. Since each of the properties is a separate entity in the land registry, the future owner can convert large houses into residential buildings or register rooms under a legal entity, such as a trade or limited liability company, and in this way, services and dinners can be provided for their guests. The properties are located in the middle of greenery 4 km from Korenica, in traditionally built houses with wooden elements. The properties offer rooms with free wireless internet access and LCD TV with satellite programs. The properties are located in the middle of greenery near Korenica, in traditionally built houses with wooden elements. All properties have wireless internet access and LCD TV with satellite programs. All necessary living facilities are located in nearby Korenica, as well as schools and sports and recreational facilities. Why is this an IDEAL INVESTMENT? It is ideal in many ways, and above all in the fact that the buyer can immediately start returning the investment and enjoy a peaceful environment full of facilities that everyone needs today.
Grijanje: Sustav grijanja: Grijalice i radijatori na struju
